expo.name: mixens

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Mixens to access your camera to upload customizable pictures to your individual drink recipes
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Mixens to access your photo library to allow for customizable pictures to your individual drink recipes

expo.description: Create and save all of your own personal cocktail recipes with your own unique ingredients, pictures, and instructions!
